svtool.core
Interface Configurable

All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryView, ServiceView
public interface Configurable

Parent interface of all objects that can read and write configurations from an XML document.

Method Summary
 org.w3c.dom.Element getConfigurations(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
          Creates an XML Element Node encapsulating the information held within this object.
 void readConfigurations(org.w3c.dom.Document configDoc)
          Reads the configuration from a Document object.
 

Method Detail

readConfigurations

public void readConfigurations(org.w3c.dom.Document configDoc)
Reads the configuration from a Document object.

Parameters:
configDoc - The XML Document object which holds the configuration information.

getConfigurations

public org.w3c.dom.Element getConfigurations(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
Creates an XML Element Node encapsulating the information held within this object.

Parameters:
doc - The parent XML document to which this node will belong to.
Returns:
Returns the element node that holds the configuration information.
